items.name: Honey Graham Waffle
items.description: Simple and Sweet – An old fashioned waffle with vanilla ice cream, honey drizzled on top with a dusting of graham cracker crumbs.

items.name: Peanut Butter Cup
items.description: Peanut butter chips hidden in the waffle with chocolate ice cream, whipped cream and salted peanuts.

items.name: Banana Nutella
items.description: Banana Plus Nutella? Yes Please! Vanilla ice cream on an old fashioned waffle with Nutella sauce drizzled over the top with fresh bananas

items.name: Strawberries and Cream
items.description: Fresh cut strawberries scattered about a tower of whipped cream resting on vanilla ice cream on top of a Belgian waffle.

items.name: Peanut Caramel Crunch
items.description: Peanut butter chips hidden in the waffle with chocolate ice cream, whipped cream and salted peanuts.

items.name: Cookies and Cream
items.description: Belgian waffle with vanilla & chocolate ice cream dressed with whipped cream and cookie crumbs.

items.name: Scoops
items.description: We make our ice cream right here and our flavors are continually rotating and while we’ll do traditional flavors, we love the opportunity to experiment and expand the boundaries of ice cream.

items.name: Sundaes
items.description: Every Day is Sundae- Day! Select your choice of ice cream and any number of toppings to create the ultimate ice cream dish. 0.50 per topping.

items.name: Waffle Cones / Bowl
items.description: Our waffle cones are made from scratch with our own house recipe. We also make waffle bowls!

items.name: Waffle Cones / Bowl
items.description: Every Day is Sundae- Day! Select your choice of ice cream and any number of toppings to create the ultimate ice cream dish. 0.50 per topping.

items.name: Banana Split
items.description: Choose your own flavors and topping to create a delicious banana split!

items.name: Variety of toppings
items.description: Sauce, syrup, sprinkles, chips, fruits and more!
